member.name: IDMLDebugDevice.SetMuteDebugOutput
member.summary: Determine whether to mute DirectML from sending messages to the .
member.param: If TRUE, DirectML is muted, and it will not send messages to the . If FALSE, DirectML is not muted, and it will send messages to the ID3D12InfoQueue. The default value is FALSE.

summary.para: Controls the DirectML debug layers. The IDMLDebugDevice interface inherits from the interface.

This interface may be retrieved from the via QueryInterface. This interface is available only if the DirectML device was created with the flag. DirectML sends messages to the associated with the passed in at ; the Direct3D 12 info queue can be retrieved via QueryInterface on the ID3D12Device
